content.prompt: The declaration can best be understood as a rejection of which of the following ideals?

choices.label: The belief that some groups of people are inherently superior to others
The belief that all cultures have intrinsic value
The belief that race is a social construction
The belief that the concept of race has had a major impact on human interactions
